relatedBlades.title: Free protection & acceleration for your website
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's mission is to help build a better Internet. We believe every website and application - whether for personal, professional or other use - should have free access to foundational security and performance. If you're looking for tools to help protect and accelerate your personal site, sign up for the Free plan below.

entry_elementMarkdown.markdown:
Free plan
What's included

![individuals - columns illustration](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/2ItqdlHlz7dXjNg8wNWqPx/6aa01c2f0847c5a227204d6e9fe170da/individuals-columns-illustration.png)
Get started in just 5 minutes

content.value: Ensure ultra-fast content delivery via Cloudflare's global network.
Secure your site to avoid browser security warnings and search engine deprioritization.
Speed up your website with the fastest, most resilient, and most secure authoritative DNS.
Protect your site from high-severity and widespread attacks.
Gain insights into your traffic, bandwidth usage, and mitigated attack requests.
Challenge or block highly prevalent malicious bots and AI bots from popular cloud providers.
Protect against application-layer DDoS attacks of any size and kind.
Protect against abusive behavior — DDoS, brute force login, and other attacks.

customPricingCta.elementName: Testing Doran's experiment - Free - Plan - Button
Testing Doran's experiment - Pro - Plan - Button

planValues.textValue: Basic security from common threats with built‑in SSL/TLS, basic WAF rules, and bot filtering

customPricingCta.elementName: Testing Doran's experiment - Free - Plan - Button

planValues.textValue: Stronger defense with advanced WAF (Cloudflare + OWASP rulesets), stolen credential checks, improved bot filtering, and DDoS alerts

customPricingCta.elementName: Testing Doran's experiment - Pro - Plan - Button

planValues.textValue: Deliver content quickly worldwide with the global CDN for faster load times

customPricingCta.elementName: Testing Doran's experiment - Free - Plan - Button

planValues.textValue: Even faster with TCP Turbo, advanced cache rules, and mobile optimization for smoother user experiences

customPricingCta.elementName: Testing Doran's experiment - Pro - Plan - Button

planValues.textValue: Simple rule options to get started quickly

customPricingCta.elementName: Testing Doran's experiment - Free - Plan - Button

planValues.textValue: Greater flexibility with more custom WAF rules, granular cache control, and fine‑tuned protection

customPricingCta.elementName: Testing Doran's experiment - Pro - Plan - Button

planValues.textValue: Community forum access for basic questions

customPricingCta.elementName: Testing Doran's experiment - Free - Plan - Button

planValues.textValue: Ticket‑based support for faster, reliable help

customPricingCta.elementName: Testing Doran's experiment - Pro - Plan - Button

planValues.textValue: Personal sites, hobby projects, or early‑stage apps needing the basics

customPricingCta.elementName: Testing Doran's experiment - Free - Plan - Button

planValues.textValue: Growing apps and businesses needing stronger protection, performance, and responsive support

relatedBlades.description:
Get more from Cloudflare

Take your performance and security even further with these paid products, which can be added to your Free plan.

addOns.entryTitle: AddOn - Argo Smart Routing - Individuals Page

iconAssetFile.altText: cloudflare argo smart routing - round icon
iconAssetFile.title: cloudflare argo smart routing - round icon

contentfulAsset.description: cloudflare argo smart routing - round icon

addOns.title: Argo Smart Routing

content.value: Argo Smart Routing is a service that uses optimized routes across the Cloudflare network to deliver responses to your users more quickly, reliably, and securely than the regular Internet. Argo includes: Smart Routing and Tiered Caching.

learnMoreLink.elementName: AddOn - Argo Smart Routing - Individuals Page - Link

callToAction.elementName: AddOn - Argo Smart Routing - Individuals Page - CTA

content.value: Load Balancing prevents service disruptions with local and global traffic load balancing, geographic routing, server health checks, and failover, ensuring the continuous availability of your critical resources.

learnMoreLink.elementName: AddOn - Load Balancing - Individuals Page - Link

callToAction.elementName: AddOn - Load Balancing - Individuals Page - CTA

content.value: Cloudflare Stream makes video storage, encoding, and playback easy. Start for $5 per month for 1,000 minutes of video stored.

addOns.entryTitle: AddOn - Advanced Certificate Manager - Individuals Page
addOns.title: Advanced Certificate Manager

content.value: Advanced Certificate Manager is a flexible and customizable way to issue and manage certificates in Cloudflare.

learnMoreLink.elementName: AddOn - Advanced Certificate Manager - Individuals Page - Link

callToAction.elementName: AddOn - Advanced Certificate Manager - Individuals Page - CTA

content.value: Cloudflare Access protects internal resources by securing, authenticating and monitoring access per-user and by application.
Rate Limiting protects against denial-of-service attacks, brute-force login attempts, and other types of abusive behavior.

learnMoreLink.elementName: AddOn - Rate Limiting - Individuals Page - Link

callToAction.elementName: AddOn - Rate Limiting - Individuals Page - CTA
